This Privacy Policy
governs the collection, use, storage, and disclosure of your data when you
access or utilize our website and services.

Information We Collect

  
  
1.1 Personal Information  
  
To provide you with personalized services, we may collect various types of
personal information that you voluntarily provide, including but not limited
to:  
  
\- Your name, email address, postal address, telephone number, and other
contact details.

\- Your work experience, educational background, skills, and other relevant
data necessary to create tailored and effective resumes.

1.2 User Activity and Analytics  
  
We gather information about your interactions with our website and services,
which includes but is not limited to:  
  
\- Pages visited, links clicked, and other actions taken on our platform.

\- Device information, IP address, browser type, operating system, and other
technical data.
\- Monitor website traffic, usage patterns, and user demographics.
